title.rendered: Macallan 40 Year Old The Red Collection

excerpt.rendered:
Released in 2020, This is The Macallan 40 Year Old, The Red Collection.
The Macallan Red Collection reflects a deep respect for time, tradition and craftsmanship. It is a celebration of the rich range of reds present naturally in The Macallan—in every step of the process. “The distinctive red colour weaves its way through our history, starting with the name of our founder Alexander Reid—literally “The Red”, to The Macallan’s ‘Choice Old’ range released over a century ago in 1903, through to Allan Shiach marking vintage bottles of The Macallan with a red ribbon in the 1980s. ” – The Macallan

Bottled at 48.1% abv, expect oranges, grapefruit and dark chocolate in this delicious dram worthy of any celebration. Produced in limited numbers, it is coveted by whisky connoisseurs and collectors across the globe. For more pictures or details on worldwide delivery, please email to: orders@simplywhisky.sg.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 40
Vintage : 
ABV : 48.1%
